TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DynamicRenderer extends System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn

summary.span: 当用户移动触笔时，会在图面上绘制墨迹。

span.span: Draws ink on a surface as the user moves the tablet pen.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类继承自类，并允许用户将触笔或其他指针设备与鼠标指针移动到面上呈现墨迹。The class inherits from the class, and allows ink to be rendered to a surface as the user moves the mouse pointer with a tablet pen or other pointing device. 你可以使用动态呈现墨迹自定义控件，或继承执行自定义呈现实时在墨迹启用元素上，如。You can use the to dynamically render ink on a custom control, or inherit from to perform custom rendering in real time on an ink-enabled element, such as the . 当用户使用触笔输入墨迹时，将独立于应用程序的用户界面线程的线程上执行动态呈现。Dynamic rendering is done on a thread separate from the application's user interface thread when the user inputs ink with a tablet pen. 当使用鼠标时，会在 UI 线程上执行动态呈现。When a mouse is used, dynamic rendering is done on the UI thread. > [!NOTE] > 若要引用此类作为[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]元素，你必须映射CLR 命名空间前缀，并使用该前缀来限定元素。In order to reference this class as a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] element, you must map the CLR namespace to a prefix, and use that prefix to qualify the element. 有关详细信息，请参阅[XAML 命名空间和 Namespace 映射为 WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。For details, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md). ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此类不常在 XAML 中使用。This class is not typically used in XAML. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将附加到。The following example demonstrates how to attach a to an . 创建动态呈现的控件墨迹，请参阅[创建墨迹输入控件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/creating-an-ink-input-control.md)。To create a control that dynamically renders ink, see [Creating an Ink Input Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/creating-an-ink-input-control.md). [!code-csharp[StylusPluginSamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/CSharp/StylusControl.cs#3)] [!code-vb[StylusPluginSamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/VisualBasic/StylusControl.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 在 XAML 中，通常不使用此属性。This property is not typically used in XAML. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建对象。The following example demonstrates how to create a object for a . 在此示例中，动态呈现的墨迹匹配指定的属性`inkDA`。In this example, the dynamically rendered ink matches the properties specified by `inkDA`. 创建动态呈现的控件墨迹，请参阅[创建墨迹输入控件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/creating-an-ink-input-control.md)。To create a control that dynamically renders ink, see [Creating an Ink Input Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/creating-an-ink-input-control.md). summary.span: 墨迹的绘制是实时的，因此墨迹看起来就像从触笔或其他指针设备中“流”出来一样。

span.span: Draws the ink in real-time so it appears to "flow" from the tablet pen or other pointing device.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 钢笔线程，此方法发生时要因此尽量少使用此方法，以免影响性能。This method occurs on a pen thread, so minimize work in this method to avoid impacting performance.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void Reset (System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice stylusDevice, System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection stylusPoints);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Reset(class System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice stylusDevice, class System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection stylusPoints) cil managed

span.span: The current stylus device.

param.name: stylusPoints
param.span: 要重新绘制的触笔接触点。

span.span: The stylus points to be redrawn.

summary.span: 清除对当前笔画的呈现并重新绘制它。

span.span: Clears rendering on the current stroke and redraws it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重绘次数表示当前的笔画和任何触笔接触点传递到方法。The redraws the current stroke and any of the stylus points passed into the method. 此方法允许你重绘描边，用户仍在创建笔画时。This method allows you to redraw a stroke while the user is still creating the stroke. 触笔必须触及数字化仪或鼠标左键必须按时调用。The tablet pen must be touching the digitizer or the left mouse button must be pressed when is called. ## Examples 如要绘制，下面的示例将更改当前描边的颜色。The following example changes the color of the current stroke as it is being drawn. [!code-csharp[StylusPluginSamples#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/CSharp/StylusControl.cs#13)] [!code-vb[StylusPluginSamples#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/VisualBasic/StylusControl.vb#13)]

exception.span: 触笔或鼠标均未处于关闭状态。

span.span: Neither the stylus nor the mouse is in the down state.

para.span: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你使用，必须将附加属性使用方法。When you use a , you must attach the property to the by using the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建并添加到。The following example demonstrates how to create a and add the to the . 创建动态呈现的控件墨迹，请参阅[创建墨迹输入控件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/creating-an-ink-input-control.md)。To create a control that dynamically renders ink, see [Creating an Ink Input Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/creating-an-ink-input-control.md).
